pages.text: Another very specialized rune, this block is used to add or remove tarot card effects from a person. Click the card into the center block and activate. No more than three cards can be on a person at a time. Use a blank tarot card to remove the oldest effect.
Run cost: 500 Tears$(br)$(l:cages/tier_iii)Tier III Soul Cage$(/l)$(br2)
